prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek, flowing design and a majestic mane.
I want to see a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of water and serenity.
Generate an image of a blue and purple Pokemon with elegant features and a calming presence.
Make a mythical creature that represents purity and grace, with flowing fins and a regal stance.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams serene landscapes, combining beauty with strength in its appearance.
Design a water Pokemon that looks both majestic and powerful, with elements of nature in its design.
Show me a legendary water-type Pokemon adorned with mystical colors and unique features.
